name: Stellar Mission
description:
Stellar Mission is a game about surviving. You are able to create platforms to stand on, but if you fall, you start over again.

You are able to purchase upgrades, either in the form of resource generators, that are essential in order to win the game, or in the form of stabilizers, that prevent decaying.

Survive and build the ultimate stabilizer, to win the game.

Note: This game uses royalty free music.
"Andreas Theme" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Setting Clarifications:
the performance tab changes the way the game is drawn. That means that with lower settings some graphical options are either disabled, or replaced by a lower quality version.
The high setting should only be used if you have a powerful enough computer.
The medium setting is for common users, but some frame drops may be experienced there as well.
The low setting is for everyone else, taking shortcuts to achieve similar effects, but not quite.
